text: And the development of the United Nations, now now there I'd say he's right, it does affect the development of the United Nations unbelievably negatively because Your decision to go in without UN sanction in an invasion which Kofi Annan said was technically illegal because it didn't have the Sanctioned Security Council Was the beginning of the absolute hollowing out of the legitimacy of the UN, which up till 2003 had had a very good Well, hold on.
